entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:36 AM PST Sunday 29 January 2023
